info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

post.summary:
Import CA certificate.
Access Group: vpngrp

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

scep_url.description: SCEP server URL. Required for import via SCEP

scep_ca_id.description: SCEP server CA identifier for import via SCEP.

scope.description: Scope of CA certificate [vdom*|global]. Global scope is only accessible for global administrators

file_content.description: Provided when uploading a file: base64 encoded file data. Must not contain whitespace or other invalid base64 characters. Must be included in HTTP body.

post.summary:
Import local certificate.
Access Group: vpngrp

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

certname.description: Certificate name for pkcs12 and regular certificate types.

password.description: Optional password for pkcs12 and regular certificate types.

key_file_content.description: Key content encoded in BASE64 for regular certificate type.

scope.description: Scope of local certificate [vdom*|global]. Global scope is only accessible for global administrators

acme_domain.description: A valid domain that resolves to an IP whose TCP port 443 reaches this FortiGate.

acme_email.description: Contact email address that is required by some CAs such as LetsEncrypt.

acme_ca_url.description: URL for the ACME CA server.

acme_rsa_key_size.description: Length of the RSA private key for the generated cert.

file_content.description: Provided when uploading a file: base64 encoded file data. Must not contain whitespace or other invalid base64 characters. Must be included in HTTP body.

post.summary:
Generate a certificate signing request (CSR) and a private key. The CSR can be retrieved / downloaded from CLI, GUI and REST API.
Access Group: vpngrp

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

certname.description: Certicate name. Used to retrieve / download the CSR. Not included in CSR and key content.

subject.description: Subject (Host IP/Domain Name/E-Mail). Common Name (CN) of the certificate subject.

keytype.description: Generate a RSA or an elliptic curve certificate request [rsa|ec]. The Elliptic Curve option is unavailable if the FortiGate is a Low Encryption Device (LENC)

keysize.description: Key size.[1024|1536|2048|4096]. 512 only if the FortiGate is a Low Encryption Device (LENC). Required when keytype is RSA.

curvename.description: Elliptic curve name. [secp256r1|secp384r1|secp521r1]. Unavailable if the FortiGate is a Low Encryption Device (LENC). Required when keytype is ec.

orgunits.description: List of organization units. Organization Units (OU) of the certificate subject.

subject_alt_name.description: Subject alternative name (SAN) of the certificate.

password.description: Password / pass phrase for the private key. If not provided, FortiGate generates a random one.

scep_url.description: SCEP server URL. If provided, use the url to enroll the csr through SCEP.

scep_password.description: SCEP challenge password. Some SCEP servers may require challege password. Provide it when SCEP server requires.

scope.description: Scope of CSR [vdom*|global]. Global scope is only accessible for global administrators

get.summary:
Check if the local certificate name is available to use.
Access Group: vpngrp

schema.title: Certificate Name Available
schema.description: Verify that the provided certificate name is available for use.

is_valid.title: Is Valid
is_valid.description: True when the provided certificate name is available.

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: mkey
parameters.description: The certificate name to be checked.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope of certificate name [vdom*|global]. Global scope is only accessible for global administrators
